CustomField.description: SHAVEEN12APR2011CASE074 > Used to store the original Opportunity Owner User details once the Opportunity is Closed. EN - 1168: Renamed label name alone but not the API and updated helptext.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Copy of the corresponding Opportunity Owner's User object fields in the following scenarios: 1. Automatically updated and checks for updates when the opportunity is open. 2. Updated when the opportunity is closed and updates only if Owner changes.
CustomField.label: Opportunity Owner User Division
